Here's a reworded version suitable for a Google Chrome extension description:
Never forget to revisit important web pages again! RemindMe is your personal web reminder assistant that helps you declutter your browser while ensuring you don't miss out on crucial content.

Key features:
1. Set timed reminders for articles, travel bookings, or any web page
2. Reduce tab clutter and optimize Chrome's memory usage
3. Get notifications when it's time to revisit a saved page
4. Easily manage and organize your web reminders

Stop drowning in open tabs. Let RemindMe help you stay organized and boost your productivity!
